data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Colmenares, Pío A., Tourinho, Ana Lúcia (2014): Two new species of Phareicranaus Roewer, 1913 (Opiliones: Laniatores: Cranaidae), with notes on gregarious behavior and maternal care in Phareicranaus manauara. Zootaxa 3768 (1): 59-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.1.4
